EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading the Pivotal Cloud Foundry & Microsoft Azure: Reference Architectures for Cloud-Native Applications white paper
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Pivotal Cloud Foundry & Microsoft Azure: Reference Architectures for Cloud-Native Applications white paper. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you investigate technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- White Paper: An Internet of Things Platform Powered by Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Microsoft Azure <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/an-internet-of-things-platform-powered-by-pcf-and-microsoft-azure]]> - eBook: Embarking on the Cloud-Native Journey to More Agile IT <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/embarking-on-the-cloud-native-journey-to-more-agile-it]]> - Partner Page: PCF and Microsoft Azure <[[https://pivotal.io/microsoft]]> - Blog Post: Pivotal Cloud Foundry goes global with Azure <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/pivotal-cloud-foundry-goes-global-with-microsoft-azure]]> - Documentation: Pivotal Cloud Foundry Reference Architectures for Public Clouds and Your Data Center <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/refarch/index.html]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog Post: Developer-Ready Infrastructure with Pivotal Cloud Foundry and VMware NSX <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/developer-ready-infrastructure-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-and-vmware-nsx]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
